column4: Can anyone tell me how well MSI MOBO's work with Linux?  I have a 865PE Neo2 Plat with a p4 2.6 an 1G ram..
how do I determine the chipset? I think it is a Northwood if that makes sense
well it seems a intel 865 doesn't it? you should not have any mayor problems. Also you can run 'lspci' and see all chips you have
